reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 227/99: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY - CHISHOLM, MOONBEAM, THE NORTH SHORE
reg_info.reg_name_text: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY — CHISHOLM, MOONBEAM, THE NORTH SHORE
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 227/99: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY - CHISHOLM, MOONBEAM, THE NORTH SHORE
reg_info.act_under: Planning Act   Loi sur l’aménagement du territoire

content.content: 1. The Minister's authority to give consents under section 53 of the Act is delegated to,  (a) the council of The Corporation of the Township of Chisholm with respect to applications for consent made before December 21, 1998 whose file numbers are set out in Schedule 1; (b) the council of The Corporation of the Municipality of Moonbeam with respect to applications for consent made before April 15, 1999 whose file numbers are set out in Schedule 2; (c) the council of The Corporation of the Township of The North Shore with respect to applications for consent made before April 15, 1999 whose file numbers are set out in Schedule 3. O. Reg. 227/99, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The Minister's authority to give consents under section 53 of the Act is delegated to,

(a) the council of The Corporation of the Township of Chisholm with respect to applications for consent made before December 21, 1998 whose file numbers are set out in Schedule 1;

(b) the council of The Corporation of the Municipality of Moonbeam with respect to applications for consent made before April 15, 1999 whose file numbers are set out in Schedule 2;

(c) the council of The Corporation of the Township of The North Shore with respect to applications for consent made before April 15, 1999 whose file numbers are set out in Schedule 3. O. Reg. 227/99, s. 1.

content.content: 2. (1) If any authority delegated under this Regulation is further delegated to a committee of council or to an appointed officer under subsection 5 (1) of the Act, the council shall forward to the Minister a certified copy of the delegating by-law within 15 days of its passing. O. Reg. 227/99, s. 2 (1). (2) The delegation under this Regulation is not terminated by reason that the condition set out in subsection (1) is not complied with. O. Reg. 227/99, s. 2 (2).
content.raw_html:
2. (1) If any authority delegated under this Regulation is further delegated to a committee of council or to an appointed officer under subsection 5 (1) of the Act, the council shall forward to the Minister a certified copy of the delegating by-law within 15 days of its passing. O. Reg. 227/99, s. 2 (1).

(2) The delegation under this Regulation is not terminated by reason that the condition set out in subsection (1) is not complied with. O. Reg. 227/99, s. 2 (2).

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 227/99, s. 3. SCHEDULE 1   TOWNSHIP OF CHISHOLM 48C 980018 O. Reg. 227/99, Sched. 1. SCHEDULE 2    MUNICIPALITY OF MOONBEAM 56C 980002 56C 980003 56C 980005 O. Reg. 227/99, Sched. 2. SCHEDULE 3    TOWNSHIP OF THE NORTH SHORE 57C 970011 O. Reg. 227/99, Sched. 3.
content.raw_html:
3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 227/99, s. 3.
